headline.main: WOMEN WARNED ON SLAVE STATE; Gov. Edison Says Those in U.S. Understand Peril of Nazi Victory Better Than Men

lead_paragraph: NEWARK, N.J., Oct. 26 -- Governor Charles Edison today discussed the Nazi threat to organized labor and to American women at a conference for women members sponsored by the United Electrical, Radio and Machine Workers of America, District 4, C.I.O., at the Hotel Douglas here.
abstract: Gov C Edison on Nazi threat to organized labor

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: ELECTRICAL, RADIO AND MACHINE WORKERS OF AMER, UNITED
